description: Ralph Integration - Transform project-studio-plugin to generate Ralph-compatible prd.json and progress.txt files with wrapper script support

userStories.title: Create Ralph Instructions Template
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a proper INSTRUCTIONS.md template based on snarktank/ralph so that Ralph knows how to execute the loop correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Template includes: read prd.json, track progress.txt, one story per iteration
Template includes: commit frequently, keep CI green
Template includes: append learnings to progress.txt
Template does NOT override project CLAUDE.md content

userStories.title: Create run.sh template for Ralph wrapper
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a run.sh template that combines Ralph execution rules with project instructions so Ralph has full context.
acceptanceCriteria: Create assets/templates/ralph-run-sh.md with shell script template
Script creates empty progress.txt if not exists

userStories.title: Create /start-ralph command
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a /start-ralph command that sets up the Ralph environment so I can begin autonomous execution.
acceptanceCriteria: Command creates .ralph/ directory if not exists

userStories.title: Add PRD to prd.json conversion to /start-ralph
userStories.description: As a developer, I want /start-ralph to convert my Feature PRD to prd.json so vanilla ralph.sh can execute it.
acceptanceCriteria: Command parses user stories into JSON with: id, title, description, acceptance_criteria, passes
Command outputs prd.json at project root
All stories start with passes: false
JSON validates against Ralph's expected schema

userStories.title: Add story sizing validation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want stories validated for single-context-window size so Ralph can complete each story in one iteration.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/story-writing/SKILL.md to reference sizing rules
Warning if files to modify > 5 files

userStories.title: Create /archive-feature command
userStories.description: As a developer, I want /archive-feature command so completed features are archived and I can start the next one.
acceptanceCriteria: Command moves progress.txt to archive directory
Command cleans up .ralph/ directory (keeps INSTRUCTIONS.md template)
Command updates .project-studio/state.yaml to mark feature complete
Command prints summary of completed stories

userStories.title: Update orchestration for Ralph workflow phase
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the orchestration skill to support Ralph workflow so the plugin guides me through Ralph-compatible development.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/orchestration/SKILL.md to include Ralph Execution phase
State tracking for active Ralph session in state.yaml
